'''''Dagger in the Water''''' is a [[Daily Commission]] in [[Fontaine]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|Pop all the Pufferfruit within the time limit. If you absorb the power of the Hunter's Ray and unleash Fontemer Water Blades, perhaps it will be easier to pop them...}}
# Destroy all the Pufferfruit
#* Activate the starting coral mechanism, then destroy all the Pufferfruit within 60 seconds.

==Locations==
* Salacia Plain, near [[Opera Epiclese]]
** 5 in a line at an angle away from the activation point.
**: <gallery>
Commission Dagger in the Water Location 1.png|Map location
</gallery>
* [[Court of Fontaine Region]], Southeast of [[Chemin de L'Espoir]]
** The first wave has 3 Pufferfruit lined up horizontally, and the second wave has two groups of 3 Pufferfruit each lined up radially outwards from the activation point.
**: <gallery>
Commission Dagger in the Water Location 2.png|Map location
</gallery>
* [[Salacia Plain]], near [[Court of Fontaine]]
** There is only one wave, with 3 lines of Pufferfruit arranged radially outwards from the activation point. The left and center lines have 3 Pufferfruit each, and the right line has 4.
**: <gallery>
Commission Dagger in the Water Location 3.png|Map location
</gallery>
* [[Liffey Region]], east of the [[Statue of The Seven]]
** 2 lines of Pufferfruit radially outwards from the activation point, with 4 on the left and 3 on the right
**: <gallery>
Commission Dagger in the Water Location 4.png|Map location
</gallery>
* [[Morte Region]]
** 6 Pufferfruit scattered horizontally and diagonally away from the activation point
**: <gallery>
Commission Dagger in the Water Location 5.png|Map location
</gallery>
